title: 16 Bridal Clutches to Love, Honor, and Cherish for the Rest of Your Days
description: Or at least until the reception ends.
excerpt: I’m rounding up 16 of the best bridal clutches to carry your necessities on the big day.
text: Sculptural Metal Alexis Bittar Leather Clutch Bag with Side HandleThis 14-carat gold-embellished handbag deserves a cocktail hour of its own. Satin Select Jimmy Choo Bonny ClutchNothing says “bride” quite like satin. This one also moonlights as a shoulder bag with a detachable strap for those seeking variety.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLocked Down Toteme T-Lock Grained-Leather ClutchBoth functional and versatile, this bag marries leather and microsuede in a catch-all clutch that can be easily converted into a cross-body bag with the addition of a strap. The T-lock will prevent any spillage as you traipse through your venue or get a little too low on the dance floor. Timeless Choice Saint Laurent Small Midnight ClutchThis year, the only aisle I’ll be walking down is at the grocery store—or with any luck, a plane. If you, too, are looking for something that feels evergreen and not overtly bridal, this clutch is perfect for both the big day and the everyday. This version comes in a trusty form with a top handle and adjustable strap.Drawstring Pouch Loewe Flamenco Mini Leather ClutchIf there was ever a time to treat yourself, it’s on your wedding day. html:
Sculptural Metal

Alexis Bittar Leather Clutch Bag with Side Handle

This 14-carat gold-embellished handbag deserves a cocktail hour of its own.

Satin Select

Jimmy Choo Bonny Clutch

Nothing says “bride” quite like satin. This one also moonlights as a shoulder bag with a detachable strap for those seeking variety.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Locked Down

Toteme T-Lock Grained-Leather Clutch

Both functional and versatile, this bag marries leather and microsuede in a catch-all clutch that can be easily converted into a cross-body bag with the addition of a strap. The T-lock will prevent any spillage as you traipse through your venue or get a little too low on the dance floor.

Timeless Choice

Saint Laurent Small Midnight Clutch

This year, the only aisle I’ll be walking down is at the grocery store—or with any luck, a plane. If you, too, are looking for something that feels evergreen and not overtly bridal, this clutch is perfect for both the big day and the everyday. Understated yet sleek, this clutch is (and holds!) everything.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tried and True

Veronica Beard Dash Clutch

Veronica Beard’s bags are famous for their supple leather, and this one is no different. This version comes in a trusty form with a top handle and adjustable strap.

Drawstring Pouch

Loewe Flamenco Mini Leather Clutch

If there was ever a time to treat yourself, it’s on your wedding day. In the Loewe’s signature Flamenco style, this bag uses a drawstring to keep your items safe and sound as you indulge in a cocktail (or two).

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Top Handle

Simkhai Ellerie Bag

Embellished with glossy imitation pearls, this clutch features a relaxed form and a magnetic closure. It’s also outfitted with an interior pocket for those can’t-lose items you’ll want tucked securely by your side all day.

Fun Touch

Olga Berg Ostrich Feather Embellished Clutch

Who needs doves when you have this show-stopper? Keep it caged under your arm, or use the removable crossbody strap for a hands-free approach.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Beaded Shoulder Bag

Staud Tommy Bag

If you prefer a shoulder bag, Staud is at the ready with this textured beaded number.

Classic Coquette

Loeffler Randall Joanne Pearl Organza Bow Clutch

Tie the knot into a sweet bow with this ultra-feminine top-handle bag.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Maximalist Statement

Simone Rocha Micro Pearl Egg Bag

Bridging together both the sculptural and the functional, this hardshell clutch is dripping in character, making it the perfect partner for brides seeking to make a statement.

Gold Rings

Jacquemus Calino

The more rings, the better, right? This pick boasts a magnetic closure and a striking gold-toned ring to wear around your wrist or hold in-hand.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

PEARLY MINAUDIÈRE

Cult Gaia Eos Bauble Acrylic Box Clutch

This one has Instagram’s brides-to-be drooling—and for good reason. An update of the brand’s beloved box bag, this Cult Gaia option offers a top-clasp closure for security.

Clamshell Top

Max Mara Nappa Leather Pasticcino Bag

In case you plan on wearing silver accessories for the big day, I present you with this darling Max Mara pouch.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Understated Glamor

Benedetta Bruzziches Belle de Jour Pouch Clutch

With an aptly named “kiss-clutch” closure, you’ll be saying “I do” before stepping foot anywhere near the altar.

Baguette-ish

DeMellier London The Miami

This classic ivory clutch is nothing if not marriage material. Any chance it’s single? Asking for a friend.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
